events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred on April 30, involving a rear-end collision at a stoplight.
The claim was reviewed and categorized as an auto accident claim based on the details of the car collision provided.
A claims agent was assigned promptly to handle the case and contact the customer for further process assistance.
Acknowledgement of claim receipt was sent to the customer with an overview of the next steps in the process.
The customer was requested to submit the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and medical bills related to the accident.
The customer successfully uploaded all requested documentation, including the accident report and vehicle damage photos.
Investigation commenced to verify accident details and liability based on submitted evidence and police reports.
Investigation concluded confirming responsibility and extent of damages consistent with customerâ€™s account.
A settlement proposal was sent to the customer outlining coverage amounts and payment timelines for repairs.
Customer responded positively expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and expedient handling.
The claim was officially approved for the full proposed settlement amount following customer acceptance.
Payment for vehicle repair costs was issued directly to the customer's designated bank account.
The claim was closed formally after payment confirmation and customer communication confirming resolution.
All documents and records related to the claim were archived securely for future reference and compliance.
